table-entry.name: Clamping
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, relativePosition INTEGER NOT NULL, smoothToPoint INTEGER NOT NULL, smoothFromPoint INTEGER NOT NULL, HEIGHT DOUBLE NOT NULL, defaultHeight DOUBLE NOT NULL, imageUrl VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Type INTEGER DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL, Clampingtype INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Clamping PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Coordinates
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), X DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, Y DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, Z DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, W DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, P DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, R DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_COORDINATES PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Gripper
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, HEIGHT DOUBLE NOT NULL, fixedHeight BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, selectGripper VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, gripperInner BOOLEAN NOT NULL, imageUrl VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Type INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Gripper PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: SocketConnection
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, ipAddress VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, portNumber INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_SocketConnection PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: RobotSetting
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), releaseBeforeMachine BOOLEAN NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_RobotSetting PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Smooth
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), X DOUBLE NOT NULL, Y DOUBLE NOT NULL, Z DOUBLE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Smooth PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Stacker
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), hPaddingSum INTEGER NOT NULL, vPaddingSum INTEGER NOT NULL, layers INTEGER NOT NULL, amount INTEGER NOT NULL, studHeight DOUBLE NOT NULL, horizontalHoleDistance DOUBLE NOT NULL, verticalHoleDistance DOUBLE NOT NULL, studDiameter DOUBLE NOT NULL, horizontalPadding DOUBLE NOT NULL, verticalPaddingBottom DOUBLE NOT NULL, orientation DOUBLE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Stacker PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: WorkPiece
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), type INTEGER NOT NULL, shape INTEGER NOT NULL, material INTEGER NOT NULL, height DOUBLE NOT NULL, length DOUBLE NOT NULL, width DOUBLE NOT NULL, diameter DOUBLE NOT NULL, weight DOUBLE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_WorkPiece PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: UserFrame
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, number INTEGER NOT NULL, zSafeDistance DOUBLE NOT NULL, location INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT UserFrame_location FOREIGN KEY (location)REFERENCES Coordinates(ID), CONSTRAINT PKEY_UserFrame PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: step
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), gripper INTEGER NOT NULL, WorkPiece INTEGER NOT NULL, UserFrame INTEGER NOT NULL, Smooth INTEGER NOT NULL, Robotsetting INTEGER NOT NULL, offset INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_STEP PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_gripper FOREIGN KEY (gripper)REFERENCES gripper(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_WorkPiece FOREIGN KEY (WorkPiece)REFERENCES WorkPiece(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_userFrame FOREIGN KEY (userFrame)REFERENCES userFrame(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_Smooth FOREIGN KEY (Smooth)REFERENCES Smooth(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_offset FOREIGN KEY (offset)REFERENCES Coordinates(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_Robotsetting FOREIGN KEY (Robotsetting)REFERENCES Robotsetting(ID)

table-entry.name: Program
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, CREATION TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, LASTOPENED TIMESTAMP, unloadstacker INTEGER NOT NULL, loadCNC INTEGER NOT NULL, unloadCNC INTEGER NOT NULL, loadstacker INTEGER NOT NULL, Clamping INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_PROGRAM PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT Program_unloadstacker FOREIGN KEY (unloadstacker)REFERENCES STEP(ID), CONSTRAINT Program_loadCNC FOREIGN KEY (loadCNC)REFERENCES STEP(ID), CONSTRAINT Program_unloadCNC FOREIGN KEY (unloadCNC)REFERENCES STEP(ID), CONSTRAINT Program_loadstacker FOREIGN KEY (loadstacker)REFERENCES STEP(ID), CONSTRAINT Program_Clamping FOREIGN KEY (Clamping)REFERENCES STEP(ID)

table-entry.name: CNCMILLINGMACHINE
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), WAYOFOPERATING INTEGER DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL, socketConnection INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT CNCMILLINGMACHINE_socketConnection FOREIGN KEY (socketConnection)REFERENCES socketConnection(ID), CONSTRAINT PKEY_CNCMILLINGMACHINE PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: MCODEADAPTER
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), RSI1 VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, RSI2 VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, RSI3 VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, RSI4 VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, RSI5 VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, RSA VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_MCODEADAPTER PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT MCODEADAPTER_CNCMILLINGMACHINE FOREIGN KEY (ID) REFERENCES CNCMILLINGMACHINE(ID) ON DELETE CASCADE

table-entry.name: MCODE
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), INDEX INTEGER NOT NULL, MCODEADAPTER INTEGER NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, RSI1 BOOLEAN NOT NULL, RSI2 BOOLEAN NOT NULL, RSI3 BOOLEAN NOT NULL, RSI4 BOOLEAN NOT NULL, RSI5 BOOLEAN NOT NULL, RSActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT true NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT MCODE PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT MCODE_MCODEADAPTER FOREIGN KEY (MCODEADAPTER) REFERENCES MCODEADAPTER(ID) ON DELETE CASCADE

table-entry.name: ROBOT
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PAYLOAD INTEGER NOT NULL, socketConnection INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT ROBOT_socketConnection FOREIGN KEY (socketConnection)REFERENCES socketConnection(ID), CONSTRAINT PKEY_ROBOT PRIMARY KEY (ID)
